accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Brian McNeill Collection of Southern Tenant Farmers Union Memorabilia #6252 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5204: Southern Tenant Farmers Union Speeches and Interviews 5204 mf: Southern Tenant Farmers Union Records on Microfilm 5859: Southern Tenant Farmers Union Research Files 5859 P: Southern Tenant Farmers Union Photographs

did.unittitle: Item 1: National Sharecroppers Fund Donation Card

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Form used to send in a donation to the fund. Addressed to Dr. Eduard C. Lindeman, Chairman.

did.unittitle: Item 2: Calling for a $625 Family Annual Wage

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Announcement of a meeting at Cotton Plant, Arkansas, have a guaranteed annual wage of $625 per family. Probably 1945, possibly 1951.
